alert.note: Alert for Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 08 at 5:27AM EDT until October 08 at 2:40PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schoharie Creek at Gilboa Bridge. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 17.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schoharie Creek Gilboa Bridge Flood Stage: 17.0 Observed Stage at Sun 4 am: 17.0 Forecast: Sun 8 am 16.9 Sun 2 pm 16.2 Sun 8 pm 15.5 Mon 2 am 14.8 Mon 8 am 14.2 Mon 2 pm 13.8 Mon 8 pm 13.4 Tue 2 am 13.2 Tue 8 am 13.0 Tue 2 pm 12.9 Tue 8 pm 12.8 Wed 2 am MSG &&
